summary: This memo details Edward G. Tichborn's bank account at Bank of America, Wilshire-Sweetzer Branch, Los Angeles. It includes instructions for depositing operational advances and salary payments into his Commercial Account. The memo mentions a $2,000 operational advance check mailed from Washington on January 15, 1960, and a $650 salary check to be mailed to the same bank.
title: Edward G. Tichborn's Bank Account Details and Payment Instructions
